channel.title: ErikSon Message for WhatsApp (stable)
channel.description: Updates for ErikSon Message for WhatsApp

item.title: Version 1.0.2
item.description:
Fixed

  • Quick Reply now inserts text into the message composer instead of the search bar
  • Improved composer detection using WhatsApp Web's conversation-compose-box-input selector
  • dist folder structure now uses channel/version layout for better organization

item.title: Version 1.0.1
item.description:
Added

  • Automated deploy workflow with one-command version bumping
  • Changelog system with release notes in Sparkle update dialog
  • Cumulative appcast history (up to 20 versions)
  • Full release notes on GitHub Releases
  • Comprehensive project documentation (README, release guide)

Changed

  • Appcast XML now includes HTML release notes in description tag
  • GitHub Release notes now use changelog markdown instead of generic text
  • Reorganized project structure under Sources/ directory
